import _toConsumableArray from"/home/ubuntu/myvscode/piaicbootcamp/piaic-bootcamp-expense-tracker/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import _objectSpread from"/home/ubuntu/myvscode/piaicbootcamp/piaic-bootcamp-expense-tracker/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";//It's basically how specifies the application state shanges in response to certain actions 
export default(function(state,action){switch(action.type){//Send down all the transactions except the value to delete
case'DELETE_TRANSACTION':return _objectSpread({},state,{//spread operator
transactions:state.transactions.filter(function(trasanction){return trasanction.id!==action.payload;})});case'ADD_TRANSACTION':return _objectSpread({},state,{//initial state by spread operator ...
transactions:[action.payload].concat(_toConsumableArray(state.transactions))});default:return state;}});
